subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mehmet Okur had 17 points and 16 rebounds and the Utah Jazz ended San Antonio’s eight-game winning streak, beating the Spurs, 90-64, on Friday night.
snippet: Mehmet Okur had 17 points and 16 rebounds and the Utah Jazz ended San Antonio’s eight-game winning streak, beating the Spurs, 90-64, on Friday night.
